name: rxremedi
description: Twitter Hubot on OpenShift and Firebase

scripts.start: PORT=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_PORT BIND_ADDRESS=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_IP HEROKU_URL=$OPENSHIFT_APP_DNS REDIS_URL=redis://:$REDIS_PASSWORD@$OPENSHIFT_REDIS_HOST:$OPENSHIFT_REDIS_PORT bin/hubot -n RxRemedi -a twitter
scripts.start_firebase: PORT=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_PORT BIND_ADDRESS=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_IP HEROKU_URL=$OPENSHIFT_APP_DNS FIREBASE_URL=$HUBOT_FIREBASE_APP_URL FIREBASE_SECRET=$HUBOT_FIREBASE_SECRET bin/hubot -n RxRemedi --adapter twitter
